content:
Hi team, I was curious about the effect of adding Verkle proofs in the block, particularly on how the proof size affects the block size.

Referring to the picture below (taken from https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RGJOQHzg3UQ), the Verkle proof size is estimated to be around 1.5MB.

Comparing to the current Ethereum block size, it's about 0.12MB (https://ycharts.com/indicators/ethereum_average_block_size).

How would the 10x increase in block size affect the network?
